abstracts.cdata!:
The Management Response to the Request
            for Inspection reports on the problems outlined in the
            Request for Inspection of the Itaparica Resettlement and
            Irrigation Project in Brazil.  The Management announces it
            is well aware of the problems described in the Request and
            provides data concerning the completion of the irrigation
            projects.  The Response addresses the complaints that the
            Bank's guidelines were not followed and that the
            resettled communities are unable to resume production
            because of the irrigation problems. The Management Response
            elaborates on the fact that other agencies were primarily
            responsible for several aspects of the project and that the
            Management's involvement was therefore limited.  The
            Management concludes that it complied with all their
            guidelines, but there were still delays and insufficiencies
            throughout the implementation of  the project.  Through
            cooperation with the Government of Brazil and other agencies
            involved with the project, the Management feels that they
            will complete the project.
